title: What to know about Lensa, the AI portrait app all over social media
description: If you've logged on to any social media app this week, you've probably seen pictures of your friends, but re-imagined as fairy princesses, animé characters, or celestial beings.

title: Historic moon mission ends with splashdown of Orion capsule
description: The Artemis I mission — a 25½-day uncrewed test flight around the moon meant to pave the way for future astronaut missions — came to an momentous end as NASA's Orion spacecraft made a successful ocean splashdown Sunday.

title: See Bernie Sanders' reaction to Sinema leaving Democratic party
description: CNN anchor Dana Bash asks Senator Bernie Sanders (I-VT) to respond to Arizona Senator Kyrsten Sinema's decision to leave the Democratic Party and become an independent.

title: Ukraine's forces cling to Bakhmut as fighting rages
See moment 3-year-old realizes her family are in her dance recital audience
description: It was Emmy's first performance at the Unity Dance Spectrum in Massachusetts. Her mom captured the precious moment the toddler realized her parents, grandparents, aunties, uncle and baby sister were in the crowd.

title: Cristiano Ronaldo speaks for first time since shock World Cup exit
description: A day after leaving the 2022 World Cup in tears as his chances to win the tournament for the first time in his career were shattered, Portugal superstar striker Cristiano Ronaldo said bringing a World Cup title to Portugal was "the biggest and most ambitious dream" of his career but "the dream was beautiful while it lasted."

title: Twitter is auctioning off HQ items, including a bird statue and espresso machines
description: If you've ever wanted to own a piece of Twitter's HQ, the company is auctioning off dozens of items of memorabilia and supplies from its office in San Francisco.

title: US hostage affairs official details Brittney Griner's flight back to US
description: The top US hostage affairs official on Sunday reflected on conducting the prisoner swap that led to Brittney Griner's release, saying the WNBA star immediately thanked the crew returning her to the United States.

title: US kills two ISIS officials in helicopter raid in eastern Syria, US Central Command says
description: The US killed two ISIS officials in a helicopter raid early Sunday morning in eastern Syria, US Central Command said in a statement.

title: Viktor Bout says he 'wholeheartedly' supports war in Ukraine
Viktor Bout says he 'wholeheartedly' supports Ukraine war and would volunteer to fight for Russia
'I'm here to take you home': Diplomat describes plane ride with Brittney Griner
description: US Special Envoy for Hostage Affairs Roger Carstens tells CNN's Dana Bash what it was like to fly with Brittney Griner after her release from a Russian penal colony.

title: Adam Scott, Naomi Campbell, Aubrey Plaza among the celebrities honoring this year's CNN Heroes
description: Celebrities and musicians are coming together tonight to honor everyday people making the world a better place.

title: The price of freedom, war and Trump
description: In Arthur Miller's play, "The Price," two brothers recount the sacrifices they made for work and family.

title: Man exonerated after 25 years: 'It's kind of surreal to me'
description: After spending 25 years in prison on murder convictions related to the 1996 shooting death of their friend, two Georgia men were exonerated this week, after new evidence uncovered in a true-crime podcast last year proved their innocence, their lawyers said. One of the co-defendants, Darrell Lee Clark, spoke to CNN affiliate WXIA after his release.

title: Lockerbie bombing suspect is now in US custody, Scottish authorities say
description: A Libyan man accused of being involved in making the bomb that destroyed Pan Am flight 103 over the town of Lockerbie in December 1988 is now in US custody, authorities in Scotland said Sunday.

title: Grant Wahl: A charming, kind and talented journalist
description: It was 5 a.m and I couldn't sleep; my mind was replaying the extraordinary drama of Argentina's penalty shootout victory over the Netherlands, over and over again.

title: The Fed will raise rates again. But it's playing with fire
description: The Federal Reserve is all but guaranteed to announce Wednesday that it will once again raise interest rates. But investors are hopeful it will be a smaller increase than the last four hikes.

title: Fight at city council holiday event caught on video
description: Video shows Kevin de León, a Los Angeles city council member, engaged in a physical altercation with a community activist during a holiday event. De León said in a statement that he was acting in self-defense.

title: NASA's historic Artemis I moon mission to conclude with splashdown of Orion capsule
description: The Artemis I mission — a 25½-day uncrewed test flight around the moon meant to pave the way for future astronaut missions — is coming to an end as NASA's Orion spacecraft is expected to make an ocean splashdown Sunday.

title: Morocco's historic World Cup achievement hailed worldwide
description: • Defending champion France holds off England

title: See moment Patti LaBelle was rushed off stage
description: A Patti LaBelle concert at the Riverside Theater in Milwaukee was abruptly halted Saturday night when the star was rushed off the stage due to a bomb threat, organizers said.

title: 'Sort Of' is about a nonbinary millennial figuring life out. Its star hopes to change how we see each other
description: In the new season of the CBC and HBO Max sitcom "Sort Of," protagonist Sabi Mehboob expresses a desire that's at once simple and incredibly elusive.

title: 11 World Cup greats — as you've never seen them before
71 years after starting college, a 90-year-old woman is graduating
description: A 90-year-old woman will finally walk across the stage and receive her diploma, 71 years after she first enrolled in college.

title: As Brittney Griner visits a medical facility in Texas, one of the 'Citgo 6' says reintegration after captivity can be difficult
description: As freed WNBA star Brittney Griner visits a Texas military medical facility following nearly 10 months of imprisonment in Russia, Jorge Toledo -- one of the "Citgo 6" -- spoke to CNN Saturday about how reintegration into society can take time and effort.

title: Survivors of mass shootings are left with lifelong wounds -- and mounting bills
description: There were a million things running through James Slaugh's mind as an ambulance rushed him to a nearby hospital after the deadly rampage in Club Q, in Colorado Springs, last month.

title: 11 World Cup greats — as you've never seen them before
description: Host of the popular soccer podcast "Men in Blazers," Roger Bennett and illustrator and artist Nate Kitch are the duo behind the recently published "Gods of Soccer" book, which looks at 50 women and 50 men who are or have been some of the sport's greatest players.

title: The UAE has launched the first Arab-built moon rover
description: A SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket launched on December 11 from the Cape Canaveral Space Force Station in Florida, carrying into space the first ever Arab-built lunar spacecraft.

title: At least 20 injured as protesters and police clash in Peru days after president's ouster
description: At least 20 people, including four police officers, were injured on Saturday in clashes between protesters and police in the southern Peruvian city of Andahuaylas in the Andes.

title: Do you really need a new phone every 2 years? How to get more out of your devices
description: If you're looking to replace or upgrade your smartphone in the coming year, take a beat and think it over. Do you really need a new phone, or do you simply have the urge to get the new, shiny tech? There are some issues to consider besides the new device's affordability.

title: SNL: Steve Martin and Martin Short eulogize each other
description: During their "Saturday Night Live" monologue, dual hosts Steve Martin and Martin Short shared eulogies they have written for each other.

title: Ukraine launches missile attack on Russian-occupied Melitopol
description: Multiple explosions have been reported in the Russian-occupied city of Melitopol in southern Ukraine and in annexed Crimea, including at a Russian military barracks.

title: Tens of thousands protest in Bangladesh to demand resignation of Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina
description: Tens of thousands of protesters took to the streets of Dhaka on Saturday calling for the dissolution of parliament to make way for new elections, and demand the resignation of Bangladeshi Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina.

title: 'Our mere existence is illegal.' As Moscow toughens anti-gay law, LGBTQ Russians fear for the future
description: Young mothers Yana and Yaroslava don't want to leave Russia with their 6-year-old son. But they fear a harsh new anti-gay law passed by Russian lawmakers will leave them little choice.

title: A trash heap 62 meters high shows the scale of India's climate challenge
description: At the Bhalswa landfill in northwest Delhi, a steady flow of jeeps zigzag up the trash heap to dump more garbage on a pile now over 62 meters (203 feet) high.

title: Michael Cohen reacts to Trump's Truth Social post
description: Former Trump attorney Michael Cohen reacts to the former president's post on his social media app Truth Social.
